item.title: Gospel Teaching—Our Most Important Calling
item.description:
Gospel Teaching—Our Most Important Calling by undefined William D. Oswald, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency given in Sunday Afternoon of 178th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 2008
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined William D. Oswald, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency
